p: Grape pomace extract (GPE) was prepared according to Mendoza et al. [ 90] with some modifications. Briefly, 300 g of ground grape pomace were extracted with 1 L of ethanol (70% v/ v) for 4 h using an ultrasonic bath. The solvent was recovered within a period of 3 h using a rotary evaporator (40 °C) under low pressure. To concentrate the extract, 20 mL of mill-Q water was added to the solution at 1 h intervals and the resultant extract was collected and stored at −20 °C.
